  • Method Details

    • addContinent

      public boolean addContinent​(Map map, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continent> continents, java.lang.String continent_name, int control_val, java.lang.String color) throws ValidMapException
      This method adds continent to map
      Parameters:
      map - current map object
      continents - the hashmap of continents
      continent_name - the name of the continent
      control_val - the control value of continent
      color - the color of continent
      Returns:
      boolean value true if country is added else returns false
      Throws:
      ValidMapException - throws an exception if map is invalid

    • addCountry

      public boolean addCountry​(Map map, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continent> continents, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Country> countries, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders, java.lang.String country_name, java.lang.String continent_name) throws ValidMapException
      This method adds countries to map
      Parameters:
      map - the map object instance
      continents - the hashmap of existing continents
      countries - the hashmap of existing countries
      country_name - the country name to be added
      continent_name - the continent name in which country needs to be added
      borders - for the borders
      Returns:
      true if country added, else false
      Throws:
      ValidMapException - to handle exception

    • addNeighbours

      public boolean addNeighbours​(Map map, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Country> countries, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders, java.lang.String country_name, java.lang.String neighbour_country_name) throws ValidMapException
      This method adds borders to map
      Parameters:
      map - the map object
      borders - the borders hashmap
      country_name - the name of the country
      neighbour_country_name - the name of the neighbour country
      countries - for country
      Returns:
      true if border added, else false
      Throws:
      ValidMapException - handles exceptions

    • deleteContinent

      public java.lang.String deleteContinent​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continent> continents, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Country> countries, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders, java.lang.String continentName)
      This method removes continent
      Parameters:
      continents - the hashmap of continents
      countries - the hashmap of countries
      borders - the hashmap of borders
      continentName - the name of continent to be removed
      Returns:
      string according to the operation is returned

    • deleteCountry

      public java.lang.String deleteCountry​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Country> countries, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders, java.lang.String countryName)
      This method removes the country specified
      Parameters:
      countries - the hashmap of countries
      borders - the hashmap of borders
      countryName - the name of the country to be removed
      Returns:
      string according to the operation is returned

    • deleteNeighbour

      public java.lang.String deleteNeighbour​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Country> countries, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders, java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.String neighbourName)
      This method removes the neighbour country
      Parameters:
      countries - the hashmap of countries
      borders - the hashmap of borders
      countryName - the name of the country
      neighbourName - the name of the neighbour country
      Returns:
      string according to the operation is returned

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders)
      This method checks if the map is connected or not
      Parameters:
      borders - the list of borders, to check connectivity
      Returns:
      true if map is connected, else false

    • traverseMap

      public void traverseMap​(int node)
      This method traverses the full map and checks the connectivity
      Parameters:
      node - the current vertex of map which is being traversed

    • neighbourNodes

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> neighbourNodes​(int n)
      This method returns array list of neighbours of given node
      Parameters:
      n - the node of which neighbours are to be found
      Returns:
      the array of neighbours
